Apple is hiring staff for these new locations. The company is also expanding in the UAE and Saudi Arabia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-ceo-tim-cook-reveals-plans-for-multiple-new-stores-in-india-and-uae-ahead-of-iphone-17-launch-check-cities-included-and-other-key-details/articleshow/123113621.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/apple-ceo-tim-cook-reveals-plans-for-multiple-new-stores-in-india-and-uae-ahead-of-iphone-17-launch-check-cities-included-and-other-key-details/articleshow/123113621.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 13:50:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26162" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123113703,imgsize-26162.cms"/></item><item><title>Operation Nagni TOP: Terror hideout busted in J&K's Kupwara; weapons recovered</title><description><![CDATA[In a significant counter-terrorism effort, the Indian Army's Operation Nagni in Kupwara, Jammu and Kashmir, resulted in the discovery of a terror hideout. Deitke, known for his work on Molmo and founding Vercept, is a highly sought-after AI talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058081,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi School Education Bill explained: Key provisions & more</title><description><![CDATA[The Delhi School Education (Transparency in Fixation and Regulation of Fees) Bill, 2025, aims to regulate fee hikes in private schools through a three-tier oversight system. Harshvardhan GB, the first IM, joins the Challengers, promising intense competition.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-chennai-grand-masters-2025-more-rounds-biggest-ever-prize-pool-and-what-more/articleshow/123112639.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-chennai-grand-masters-2025-more-rounds-biggest-ever-prize-pool-and-what-more/articleshow/123112639.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 12:58:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="72354" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123113225,imgsize-72354.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid Trump’s tariff threats, India plans Rs 20,000cr project for exporters</title><description><![CDATA[India is set to launch a ₹20,000 crore Export Promotion Mission by September to shield exporters from global trade uncertainties. Tharoor points out holes in Indian team, bats for Sarfaraz's inclusion</title><description><![CDATA[Following India's thrilling Test victory against England, Congress leader Shashi Tharoor lauded the team's performance, highlighting contributions from Gill, Siraj, Jaiswal, and others. While praising the team's strengths, Tharoor pointed out the need for a strong middle-order batsman, pace-bowling backups, and a fast-bowling all-rounder.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/chak-de-india-shashi-tharoor-points-out-holes-in-indian-team-bats-for-sarfaraz-khans-inclusion/articleshow/123109759.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/chak-de-india-shashi-tharoor-points-out-holes-in-indian-team-bats-for-sarfaraz-khans-inclusion/articleshow/123109759.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 10:15:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="73700" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123109851,imgsize-73700.cms"/></item><item><title>India upcoming matches 2025: Full cricket schedule after England series</title><description><![CDATA[Following a drawn Test series against England, India faces a busy cricket schedule in 2025. The Asia Cup in September will see a young team led by Suryakumar Yadav, while Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli return for the ODIs in Australia. The year concludes with a full home series against South Africa, featuring Tests, ODIs, and T20Is.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/india-upcoming-matches-2025-full-cricket-schedule-after-england-test-series/articleshow/123109481.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/india-upcoming-matches-2025-full-cricket-schedule-after-england-test-series/articleshow/123109481.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 09:58:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="141716" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123109522,imgsize-141716.cms"/></item><item><title>Security lapse at Red Fort: Dummy bomb goes undetected in security drill; 7 personnel suspended</title><description><![CDATA[In a significant security lapse, seven police personnel have been suspended after failing to detect a dummy bomb during a routine drill at Delhi's Red Fort. The security test aimed to assess the alertness of officers at the access control point. A team successfully breached security with a fake explosive, raising serious concerns about preparedness.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/dummy-bomb-goes-undected-in-red-fort-security-drill-7-personnel-suspended/articleshow/123101982.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/dummy-bomb-goes-undected-in-red-fort-security-drill-7-personnel-suspended/articleshow/123101982.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 23:31:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57546" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123107156,imgsize-57546.cms"/></item><item><title>Karnataka bus strike begins: Employees defy HC order as talks fail; thousands stranded</title><description><![CDATA[Karnataka Bus Strike: Karnataka's public transport system is paralyzed as state road transport corporation employees initiate an indefinite strike, demanding wage revision and clearance of salary arrears. Despite a High Court stay, bus services are suspended across major cities, leaving commuters stranded and scrambling for alternatives.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/karnataka-bus-strike-begins-employees-defy-hc-order-as-talks-fail-thousands-stranded-across-state/articleshow/123108083.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/karnataka-bus-strike-begins-employees-defy-hc-order-as-talks-fail-thousands-stranded-across-state/articleshow/123108083.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 08:36:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1555973" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123108340,imgsize-1555973.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
